00047 LPtoPTemplate::LPtoPTemplate(QualityMetric *qualitymetric, short Pinput, MsqError &err)
00048   : ObjectiveFunctionTemplate(qualitymetric)
00049 {
00050   pVal=Pinput;
00051   if(pVal<1){
00052     MSQ_SETERR(err)("P_VALUE must be greater than 0.", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00053     return;
00054   }
00055 
00056   dividingByN=false;
00057 
00058   clear();
00059 }
00060 
00061 LPtoPTemplate::LPtoPTemplate( short P, QualityMetric* qm )
00062   : ObjectiveFunctionTemplate(qm), pVal(P), dividingByN(false)
00063   { clear(); }
00064   
00065 void LPtoPTemplate::clear()
00066 {
00067   mCount = 0;
00068   mPowSum = 0;
00069   saveCount = 0;
00070   savePowSum = 0;
00071 }

00078 ObjectiveFunction* LPtoPTemplate::clone() const
00079   { return new LPtoPTemplate(*this); }

00081 double LPtoPTemplate::get_value( double power_sum, size_t count, EvalType type,
00082                                  size_t& global_count, MsqError& err )
00083 {
00084   double result = 0;
00085   switch (type) 
00086   {
00087     case CALCULATE:
00088       result = power_sum;
00089       global_count = count;
00090       break;
00091     
00092     case ACCUMULATE:
00093       mPowSum += power_sum;
00094       mCount += count;
00095       result = mPowSum;
00096       global_count = mCount;
00097       break;
00098     
00099     case SAVE:
00100       savePowSum = power_sum;
00101       saveCount = count;
00102       result = mPowSum;
00103       global_count = mCount;
00104       break;
00105     
00106     case UPDATE:
00107       mPowSum -= savePowSum;
00108       mCount -= saveCount;
00109       savePowSum = power_sum;
00110       saveCount = count;
00111       mPowSum += savePowSum;
00112       mCount += saveCount;
00113       result = mPowSum;
00114       global_count = mCount;
00115       break;
00116     
00117     case TEMPORARY:
00118       result = mPowSum - savePowSum + power_sum;
00119       global_count = mCount + count - saveCount;
00120       break;
00121   }
00122   
00123 //  if (!global_count)
00124 //    {
00125 //      MSQ_SETERR(err)(" global_count is zero, possibly due to an invalid mesh.", MsqError::INVALID_MESH);
00126 //      return -1;  // result is invalid
00127 //    }   
00128   if (dividingByN && global_count)
00129     result /= global_count;
00130   return result;
00131 }
00132 
00133 bool LPtoPTemplate::evaluate( EvalType type, 
00134                               PatchData& pd,
00135                               double& value_out,
00136                               bool free,
00137                               MsqError& err )
00138 {
00139   QualityMetric* qm = get_quality_metric();
00140   if (type == ObjectiveFunction::ACCUMULATE)
00141     qm->get_single_pass( pd, qmHandles, free, err );
00142   else
00143     qm->get_evaluations( pd, qmHandles, free, err );  
00144   MSQ_ERRFALSE(err);
00145   
00146     // calculate OF value for just the patch
00147   std::vector<size_t>::const_iterator i;
00148   double value, working_sum = 0.0;
00149   for (i = qmHandles.begin(); i != qmHandles.end(); ++i)
00150   {
00151     bool result = qm->evaluate( pd, *i, value, err );
00152     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !result)
00153       return false;
00154     
00155     double tmp_val = value;
00156     for (short j = 1; j < pVal; ++j)
00157       tmp_val *= value;
00158     working_sum += fabs(tmp_val);
00159   }
00160   
00161     // get overall OF value, update member data, etc.
00162   size_t global_count;
00163   value_out = qm->get_negate_flag() * get_value( working_sum, qmHandles.size(), type, global_count, err );
00164 //  if (!global_count)
00165 //    return false;  // invalid mesh
00166 //  else
00167   return true;
00168 }
00169 
00170 bool LPtoPTemplate::evaluate_with_gradient( EvalType type, 
00171                                             PatchData& pd,
00172                                             double& OF_val,
00173                                             std::vector<Vector3D>& grad_out,
00174                                             MsqError& err )
00175 {
00176   QualityMetric* qm = get_quality_metric();
00177   qm->get_evaluations( pd, qmHandles, OF_FREE_EVALS_ONLY, err );  MSQ_ERRFALSE(err);
00178   
00179     // zero gradient
00180   grad_out.clear();
00181   grad_out.resize( pd.num_free_vertices(), Vector3D(0.0,0.0,0.0) );
00182   bool qm_bool=true;
00183   double QM_val;
00184   OF_val = 0.;
00185   int p1;
00186   
00187     // calculate OF value and gradient for just the patch
00188   std::vector<size_t>::const_iterator i;
00189   for (i = qmHandles.begin(); i != qmHandles.end(); ++i)
00190   {
00191     qm_bool = qm->evaluate_with_gradient( pd, *i, QM_val, mIndices, mGradient, err );
00192     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !qm_bool)
00193       return false;
00194     
00195     QM_val = fabs(QM_val);
00196     double QM_pow = 1.0;
00197     double factor = qm->get_negate_flag();
00198     if (pVal == 1) 
00199       QM_pow = 1.0;
00200     else {
00201       QM_pow = QM_val;
00202       for (p1 = 2; p1 < pVal; ++p1)
00203         QM_pow *= QM_val;
00204       factor *= QM_pow * pVal;
00205     }
00206     
00207     OF_val += QM_pow * QM_val;
00208     for (size_t j = 0; j < mIndices.size(); ++j) {
00209       mGradient[j] *= factor;
00210       grad_out[mIndices[j]] += mGradient[j];
00211     }
00212   }
00213   
00214     // get overall OF value, update member data, etc.
00215   size_t global_count;
00216   OF_val = qm->get_negate_flag() * get_value( OF_val, qmHandles.size(), type, global_count, err );
00217 //  if (!global_count)
00218 //    return false;  // invalid mesh
00219 
00220   if (dividingByN && global_count) {
00221     const double inv_n = 1.0/global_count;
00222     std::vector<Vector3D>::iterator g;
00223     for (g = grad_out.begin(); g != grad_out.end(); ++g)
00224       *g *= inv_n;
00225   }  
00226   
00227   return true;
00228 }
00229   
00230 bool LPtoPTemplate::evaluate_with_Hessian_diagonal( EvalType type, 
00231                                         PatchData& pd,
00232                                         double& OF_val,
00233                                         std::vector<Vector3D>& grad,
00234                                         std::vector<SymMatrix3D>& hess_diag,
00235                                         MsqError& err )
00236 {
00237   QualityMetric* qm = get_quality_metric();
00238   qm->get_evaluations( pd, qmHandles, OF_FREE_EVALS_ONLY, err );  MSQ_ERRFALSE(err);
00239   
00240     // zero gradient and hessian
00241   grad.clear();
00242   grad.resize( pd.num_free_vertices(), 0.0 );
00243   hess_diag.clear();
00244   hess_diag.resize( pd.num_free_vertices(), 0.0 );
00245   
00246   double QM_val, QM_pow = 1.0;
00247   double fac1, fac2;
00248   const double negate_flag = qm->get_negate_flag();
00249   bool qm_bool;
00250   size_t i;
00251   short p;
00252    
00253   // Loops over all elements in the patch.
00254   OF_val = 0.0;
00255   std::vector<size_t>::const_iterator k;
00256   for (k = qmHandles.begin(); k != qmHandles.end(); ++k)
00257   {
00258     // Computes \nabla^2 Q(e). Only the free vertices will have non-zero entries. 
00259     qm_bool = qm->evaluate_with_Hessian_diagonal( pd, *k, QM_val, mIndices, mGradient, mDiag, err );
00260     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !qm_bool) return false;
00261     QM_val = fabs(QM_val);
00262 
00263     // **** Computes Hessian ****
00264     const size_t nve = mIndices.size();
00265     if (pVal == 1) {
00266       QM_pow = 1.0;
00267       for (i=0; i<nve; ++i) {
00268         mDiag[i] *= negate_flag;
00269         hess_diag[mIndices[i]] += mDiag[i];
00270       }
00271       fac1 = 1;
00272     }
00273     else if (pVal >= 2) {
00274        // Computes the coefficients:
00275       QM_pow = 1.0;
00276       for (p=0; p<pVal-2; ++p)
00277         QM_pow *= QM_val;
00278       // 1 - computes p(p-1)Q(e)^{p-2}
00279       fac2 = pVal* (pVal-1) * QM_pow;
00280       // 2 - computes  pQ(e)^{p-1}
00281       QM_pow *= QM_val;
00282       fac1 = pVal * QM_pow;
00283 
00284         //fac1 *= qm->get_negate_flag();
00285         //fac2 *= qm->get_negate_flag();
00286 
00287       for (i=0; i<nve; ++i) {
00288         SymMatrix3D op(mGradient[i]);
00289         op *= fac2;
00290         mDiag[i] *= fac1;
00291         op += mDiag[i];
00292         op *= negate_flag;
00293         hess_diag[mIndices[i]] += op;
00294       }
00295     } else {
00296       MSQ_SETERR(err)(" invalid P value.", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00297       return false;
00298     }
00299 
00300 
00301     // **** Computes Gradient ****
00302 
00303     // For each vertex in the element ... 
00304     for (i=0; i<nve; ++i) {
00305       // ... computes p*q^{p-1}*grad(q) ...
00306       mGradient[i] *= fac1*negate_flag;
00307       // ... and accumulates it in the objective function gradient.
00308         //also scale the gradient by the scaling factor
00309       assert (mIndices[i] < pd.num_free_vertices());
00310       grad[mIndices[i]] += mGradient[i];
00311     }
00312 
00313     // **** computes Objective Function value \sum_{i=1}^{N_e} |q_i|^P ****
00314     OF_val += QM_pow * QM_val;
00315   }
00316 
00317   size_t global_count;
00318   OF_val = negate_flag
00319          * get_value( OF_val, qmHandles.size(), type, global_count, err );
00320 //  if (!global_count)
00321 //    return false;  // invalid mesh
00322 
00323   if (dividingByN && global_count) {
00324     const double inv_n = 1.0 / global_count;
00325     for (i = 0; i < pd.num_free_vertices(); ++i) {
00326       grad[i] *= inv_n;
00327       hess_diag[i] *= inv_n;
00328     }
00329   }
00330   
00331   return true;
00332 }
00333         
00334 /*\ For each element, each entry to be accumulated in the Hessian for
00335     this objective function (\f$ \sum_{e \in E} Q(e)^p \f$ where \f$ E \f$
00336     is the set of all elements in the patch) has the form:
00337     \f$ pQ(e)^{p-1} \nabla^2 Q(e) + p(p-1)Q(e)^{p-2} \nabla Q(e) [\nabla Q(e)]^T \f$.
00338 
00339     For \f$ p=2 \f$, this simplifies to
00340     \f$ 2Q(e) \nabla^2 Q(e) + 2 \nabla Q(e) [\nabla Q(e)]^T \f$.
00341 
00342     For \f$ p=1 \f$, this simplifies to \f$ \nabla^2 Q(e) \f$.
00343 
00344     The \f$ p=1 \f$ simplified version is implemented directly
00345     to speed up computation. 
00346 
00347     This function does not support vertex-based metrics.
00348     
00349     \param pd The PatchData object for which the objective function
00350            hessian is computed.
00351     \param hessian this object must have been previously initialized.
00352 */
00353 bool LPtoPTemplate::evaluate_with_Hessian( EvalType type, 
00354                                            PatchData& pd,
00355                                            double& OF_val,
00356                                            std::vector<Vector3D>& grad,
00357                                            MsqHessian& hessian,
00358                                            MsqError& err )
00359 {
00360   QualityMetric* qm = get_quality_metric();
00361   qm->get_evaluations( pd, qmHandles, OF_FREE_EVALS_ONLY, err );  MSQ_ERRFALSE(err);
00362   double negate_flag = qm->get_negate_flag();
00363   
00364     // zero gradient and hessian
00365   grad.clear();
00366   grad.resize( pd.num_free_vertices(), 0.0 );
00367   hessian.zero_out();
00368   
00369   double QM_val, QM_pow = 1.0;
00370   double fac1, fac2;
00371   Matrix3D elem_outer_product;
00372   bool qm_bool;
00373   size_t i, j, n;
00374   short p;
00375    
00376   // Loops over all elements in the patch.
00377   OF_val = 0.0;
00378   std::vector<size_t>::const_iterator k;
00379   for (k = qmHandles.begin(); k != qmHandles.end(); ++k)
00380   {
00381     // Computes \nabla^2 Q(e). Only the free vertices will have non-zero entries. 
00382     qm_bool = qm->evaluate_with_Hessian( pd, *k, QM_val, mIndices, mGradient, mHessian, err );
00383     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !qm_bool) 
00384       return false;
00385     QM_val = fabs(QM_val);
00386 
00387     // **** Computes Hessian ****
00388     const size_t nve = mIndices.size();
00389     if (pVal == 1) {
00390       QM_pow = 1.0;
00391       n=0;
00392       for (i=0; i<nve; ++i) {
00393         for (j=i; j<nve; ++j) {
00394             //negate if necessary
00395           mHessian[n] *= negate_flag;
00396           hessian.add( mIndices[i], mIndices[j], mHessian[n], err ); MSQ_ERRFALSE(err);
00397           ++n;
00398         }
00399       }
00400       fac1 = 1;
00401     }
00402     else if (pVal >= 2) {
00403        // Computes the coefficients:
00404       QM_pow = 1.0;
00405       for (p=0; p<pVal-2; ++p)
00406         QM_pow *= QM_val;
00407       // 1 - computes p(p-1)Q(e)^{p-2}
00408       fac2 = pVal* (pVal-1) * QM_pow;
00409       // 2 - computes  pQ(e)^{p-1}
00410       QM_pow *= QM_val;
00411       fac1 = pVal * QM_pow;
00412 
00413         //fac1 *= qm->get_negate_flag();
00414         //fac2 *= qm->get_negate_flag();
00415 
00416       n=0;
00417       for (i=0; i<nve; ++i) {
00418         for (j=i; j<nve; ++j) {
00419           elem_outer_product.outer_product(mGradient[i], mGradient[j]);
00420           elem_outer_product *= fac2;
00421           mHessian[n] *= fac1;
00422           mHessian[n] += elem_outer_product;
00423           mHessian[n] *= negate_flag;
00424           hessian.add( mIndices[i], mIndices[j], mHessian[n], err ); MSQ_ERRFALSE(err);
00425           ++n;
00426         }
00427       }
00428     } else {
00429       MSQ_SETERR(err)(" invalid P value.", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00430       return false;
00431     }
00432 
00433 
00434     // **** Computes Gradient ****
00435 
00436     // For each vertex in the element ... 
00437     for (i=0; i<nve; ++i) {
00438       // ... computes p*q^{p-1}*grad(q) ...
00439       mGradient[i] *= fac1*negate_flag;
00440       // ... and accumulates it in the objective function gradient.
00441         //also scale the gradient by the scaling factor
00442       assert (mIndices[i] < pd.num_free_vertices());
00443       grad[mIndices[i]] += mGradient[i];
00444     }
00445 
00446     // **** computes Objective Function value \sum_{i=1}^{N_e} |q_i|^P ****
00447     OF_val += QM_pow * QM_val;
00448   }
00449 
00450   size_t global_count;
00451   OF_val = negate_flag
00452          * get_value( OF_val, qmHandles.size(), type, global_count, err );
00453 //  if (!global_count)
00454 //    return false;  // invalid mesh
00455 
00456   if (dividingByN && global_count) {
00457     const double inv_n = 1.0 / global_count;
00458     std::vector<Vector3D>::iterator g;
00459     for (g = grad.begin(); g != grad.end(); ++g)
00460       *g *= inv_n;
00461     hessian.scale( inv_n );
00462   }
00463   
00464   return true;
00465 }
